snippet: President Obama promised transparency, and he can begin with the secret surveillance court.
abstract: Editorial dismisses Pres Obama's reassurances about surveillance programs run by National Security Agency; holds that if Obama is serious about transparency, he should start by declassifying rulings of secret surveillance court established by Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act.
lead_paragraph: President Obama promised transparency, and he can begin with the secret surveillance court.

headline.main: Details on Spying, Not More Assurances
headline.print_headline: Details on Spying, Not More Assurances
